body.name: Pure Enrichment® PureZone™ Mini Portable Air Purifier - Cordless True HEPA Filter Cleans Air & Eliminates 99.97% of Dust, Odors, & Allergens Close to You - Cars, School, & Office (Starlight Blue)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 42 mins
features: PERSONAL AIR PURIFIER: This convenient, portable travel air purifier cleans 6ft² of air in 12 minutes*, so you can breathe fresher air in your personal space and tackle common issues, such as allergies, sinus problems, colds, nasal swelling, and more.

TRUE HEPA FILTER: The 2-stage filtration system eliminates 99.97% of germs. Stage 1 is an Activated Carbon Pre-Filter that traps odors and harmful gasses, while the Stage 2 True HEPA Filter eliminates dust, dander, pet hair, pollen, mold spores, and smoke in the air.

CORDLESS & TRAVEL-FRIENDLY: The rechargeable lithium-ion battery lasts up to 12 hours, so you can use the purifier with or without an outlet. You can even purify the air inside your car, so you have clean air to and from any location. Weighing less than 1 pound, it’s a lightweight and portable option for anyone on-the-go.

CUSTOMIZED FEATURES: The adjustable handle allows you to place the air purifier either upright or on its side to find the best position, or even remove the handle when you don’t need it. Choose from 3 fan speeds (low, medium, or high) to find the air purification that works best for you. Place the fan speed on high and the purifier can even double as your own personal cooling fan.

5-YEAR WARRANTY: This mini air purifier comes with a 2-in-1 filter, USB charging cable, and Pure Enrichment’s guaranteed 5-Year Warranty. Our customer support team provides daily quality service and peace of mind to millions worldwide all from a brand you can trust. *Coverage area based on AHAM standard of CADR (4 CFM) x 1.55.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For Dependable Purification While Cruising
reviews.reviewText: I bought this compact little air purifier, because it was very light weight and compact enough to fit in my luggage without occupying loads of space.I love the fact that it is quiet, easy to operate and put together. While on the cruise I ended up accidentally discovering that you are able to operate it while it is charging the battery, so you can benefit from the around the clock purification without having to stop to charge it.I walked into the cabin to find white lint floating around in the air, revealed by the room lighting. I plugged my purifier in, left for dinner and a few shows, when I returned the lint was clear and the room smelled a lot fresher.This is a very tiny but powerful device. I would definitely say it is worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this mini portable air purifier! It’s small enough to pack in my bag, great to take on trips, and not too noisy! I feel much better going to new places knowing I have an air purifier handy anytime to help eliminate allergens. I love that it has a true HEPA filter too. It’s a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Powerful Little Machine
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I purchased this air purifier for on the airplane. I have to say I was very impressed. The air smelled so much fresher. I purchased a 3rd party case separately to store it in my carry on. It fit perfectly. I struggled to keep it on the tray table due to handle. So I just held it.I also used it in the car that I borrowed that had a bit of "funk" smell. It worked great for making it smell fresher. The only struggle I had was that most of the vents were blocked by the cupholders, but it was still able to work well.Pros: This little machine is powerful for it's size. It clears the surrounding air quickly. It is a little louder than I expected, however still fairly quiet. (The video is with my bathroom fan on as well.) The battery lasts a long time.Cons: The handle that is provided fits loosely. It also does not provide a stable surface for it to lay on its side as shown in the photos. The power button can be easily turned on if not placed inside a case (which is sold separately). The vents are mostly blocked if placed inside the cupholders in your vehicle.Overall, this is a great product and I love the company who makes it. I have loved all of their products so far and would recommend to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a small, compact, very efficient, and price right air purifier. It's quiet and it does the job. It looks great and has a handle. It has 3 speeds and the filter lasts 6 months. The customer service is on par as well. They are very responsive. I would to see a reusable or washable filter made. Thanks for a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small, lightweight, and super convenient.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this air filter so that I would have something small and easy to carry for in-person activities like work meetings, and it happened to arrive the day before I had to sit in a hospital waiting room all day while a family member had surgery. It made me feel so much better to know that I had an extra layer of protection from any sniffles or bugs that might have been floating around.The battery life is also very solid for such a little unit: I ran it on high nearly the whole day at the hospital and it lasted around 8 hours. It's so petite that I can fit it in a standard car cup holder (or the one at the movie theater), and it's quiet enough that I have run it in a theater without it disturbing any other patrons.Over all, I consider this totally worth the purchase price and I'm considering getting another to keep in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Does it really work?
reviews.reviewText: I had this unit for about nine months. I kept it at my desk at work which my computer and the unused part of my desk is always getting dusty. I open the filter after nine months of use and the filter looks brand new. Not one spec of dust on the filter. I ended up putting it back in the box and now it sits stored away. The hassle of always charging this and the noise level didn't make it worth it for me to keep using when it obviously was not doing anything. Also it seems the air only flows in level 2 or 3.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Received my PureZone Mini Portable Air Purifier three weeks ago. I wanted to use it consistently before reverting about it's functionality, quality, etc.I got this for my cube at work as my coworkers and I are certain there's something in the airducts causing us to have nasal congestion/allergy like symptoms.The make is sturdy feeling for a portable unit and it's compact design means I can lay or stand it pretty much anywhere in my cube. I have a convertible standing desk so I hang it from the shelf next to me while it's up and infront of me when it's down.It was simple to set up, clear and easy instructions. I let it charge for a few hours via my laptop dock and set it to the first setting for the rest of the day once it was fully charged.It isn't too loud, which is great as I have Teams/phone calls throughout the day. The battery lasts my entire shift on a daily basis after charging overnight.I feel like in the last three weeks I've not been going home as stuffy feeling and I'm not sneezing as much as I have been while in office. So it seems to be working well and with noticeable results! Very happy I gave this a shot.I plan to buy some more units for my coworkers for the holidays!

i love this little purifier. especially useful for things like dentist appointments where you aren't able to wear a mask, but just general helps me feel safer. also just makes the air nice and fresh for my bedroom. its super light, cute design and the lowest setting is very quiet.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pretty, portable and does the job! Love it!
reviews.reviewText: We received delivery of our first Purezone Mini Portable Air Purifier several days ago and have been using it daily! Very pleased with how relatively quiet it is compared to other brands. It’s pretty, inconspicuous and fits in my car’s cup holder. Great for carpooling in the winter when windows are rolled up and lacking fresh air. We are going on a cruise this Summer and plan to take it traveling with us just for that extra protection and peace of mind in our cabin against the cruise ship’s recycled air. So impressed with the performance and reasonable cost we are going to buy a second one!
solo duro 3 meses, derepente dejo de funcionar, carga, prende pero no funciona
An easy to use product. Very effective in my vehicle. Quite happy with its performance.
